name: QML
description:
Provides syntax support in .qml files for both Qt5 and Qt6:
  • Highlighting and code completion for QML types and properties.
  • Find Usages for QML symbols.
  • Structure View for the file contents.
  • Quick Documentation for QML symbols.
  • Code formatting via qmlformat.
  • QML language server integration.
This plugin is endorsed but not maintained by the Qt Group.
